_header: Come thou man ne dread thee nast
_description: Bidding of the Virgin to man — one 6-line stanza

EDU107.Transcription:
Cum þu man ne drad þe nastmi sune þat þe
                    haueþ so dure i boȝtwiþ blodi side bid for þehis
                    moder mid hure breste sweteheo nele þe for letefor milse and
                    merci forbied hit me
